sentences.sContent: Any narrative, any model, that could embody the fundamental organizing principles of human affairs can only be vague in its formative stages.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any narrative, any model, that could embody the fundamental organizing principles of human affairs can only be vague in its formative stages.
sentences.sCn: 任何能体现人类事务中组织性的原则的叙述性，模范式的言语，在他的形成阶段都是模糊地。

sentences.sContent: Constructive formative assessment, reflective writing assignments, assessment of the facilitator and faculty and students learning together were a few of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Constructive formative assessment, reflective writing assignments, assessment of the facilitator and faculty and students learning together were a few of them.
sentences.sCn: 建设性的格式化评估，反映性写作分配，调解人评估和教员与学生一起学习是其中一部分。

synos.tran: 形成的；造型的；格式化的

phrases.pCn: 形成性评价；形成性测试；教学评测

words.tran: 模型，样板；起形成作用的人
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪
